body:
I've been absent for quite a while lately, and if you saw my last forum post, you'll notice I have a job. Along with that job I also have school, and track and field which is starting next week. As much as I would like to play with you guys and make everyone mad by bow spamming them, I simply do not have the time to sit down and do that lately. 

Unfortunately for me, I won't be enjoying this server as much as I used to. You may see me on rare occasions, but not on a day-to-day basis like in the past. 

Sees y'alls laters,
Shrimpy

G'bye.

title: Sees y'alls laters!

replies.body: Good bye m8.  I used to run track :D.  Good luck in life!
replies.body_tagged: Good bye m8.  I used to run track :D.  Good luck in life!

replies.body: Hope you have fun with your job. Once I get a job my plan is to save up for PC parts without my parents knowing, building the PC secretly then bringing them home and having them be like: "ANUUUUUUJ!!!!!!!!".
replies.body_tagged: Hope you have fun with your job. Once I get a job my plan is to save up for PC parts without my parents knowing, building the PC secretly then bringing them home and having them be like: "ANUUUUUUJ!!!!!!!!".

replies.body: Goodbye! I wish you good luck in life!
replies.body_tagged: Goodbye! I wish you good luck in life!

replies.body: It's sad to see you go, but I wish you the best of luck in life! Hope to see you around sometime, until then.. Goodbye!
